short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record your dashboards for playback on your ScreenCloud Player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScreenCloud's Dashboard recorder allows you to point and click your way through your favourite sites and dashboards, recording the steps you take for later playback.   Once saved, share your sites or dashboards securely with your customers, employees or colleagues by displaying them on your digital signage or embedded channels.
